0.9.0.name: wordpress/gravatarlocalcache
0.9.0.description:
With this plugin you can cache gravatar images on your server (and they will be delivered with the cache settings of your webserver).

Please report bugs and/or feature-request to our ticket-system: Bugtracker/Wiki. For Support, please use the forum. Latest development news: Twitter.
